fullDescription.option: Case Id for the first event log to identify traces
Event Id for the first event log to identify events in traces with the same caseID
Case Id for the second event log to identify traces
Event Id for the second event log to identify events in traces with the same caseID

It includes four strategies: Separate Trace: For the traces with same caseID, we still put them together. Ignore Trace: For the traces with the same caseID from the second event log, we ignore those traces. Internal Trace Merge: For the traces with the same caseID, we merge all events from two traces together. But the trace attributes, we modify them according to the options. Internal Event Merge: In traces with same caseID, the events with same eventID merge together but with different attributes chosen from the table below.
The trace attributes chosen for the merged traces
The event attributes chosen for the merged events in traces.

ports.inPort: First event log to be merged. Usually as the base event log
